mapper.select: SELECT t.*, t.color_name as color, t1.color_hex FROM t_basicsdatum_material_color t LEFT JOIN t_goods_color t1 ON t.company_code = t1.company_code AND t.color_code = t1.color_code and t1.del_flag = '0' WHERE t.company_code = #{companyCode} and t.del_flag = '0' and t.material_code = #{materialCode}
SELECT t.color_code as colourCode, t.color_name as colourName FROM t_basicsdatum_material_color t WHERE t.company_code = #{companyCode} and t.del_flag = '0' and t.material_code = #{materialCode}

SELECT t.*
FROM t_basicsdatum_material_width t LEFT JOIN t_basicsdatum_specification t1 ON t.company_code = t1.company_code AND t.width_code = t1.`code` and t1.del_flag = '0' WHERE t.company_code = #{companyCode} and t.del_flag = '0' and t.material_code = #{materialCode}
SELECT t.width_code as code, t.name FROM t_basicsdatum_material_width t WHERE t.company_code = #{companyCode} and t.del_flag = '0' and t.material_code = #{materialCode}

SELECT bm.id, bm.company_code, bm.id AS material_id, bm.material_name, bm.material_code, bm.status, bm.material_code_name, bm.image_url, bm.category_name, bm.category_id, bm.category_ids, bm.factory_composition, bm.ingredient, bm.translate, bm.loss_rate FROM t_basicsdatum_material bm WHERE bm.del_flag = '0'
